name: Dragonlord: Book One
description:
Your memories stolen.And you are the last of the Dragon slayers.You feel like giving up.But there is hope. Would you take it?

You are Drahcirus the last of the Dragonslayers who appears to be more than what he knows and, discovers secrets kept from him.

You attempt to take back your memories from the Grei Dragons to save the world of Bolkien.

Features:

  • Learn skills as you absorb the Grei Dragons' memories.
  • Experience dramatic moments as you play the game.
  • Forge swords from dragon souls.
  • Ingame achievements!
